name: Empcoin v2
description: EMPv2 is the official token of GBEI and Empress Speaks (DBA) under Empress Speaks LLC,
temporarily replacing EMP Coin v1 until full administrative control is restored.
Legacy Has a Coin — EMPCOINv2 ($EMPv2) is the empowerment currency from Empress Speaks.
Part meme, part movement — turning viral energy into real-world equity and cultural empowerment.
Set the standard. Join the movement.
